name: The Mad Hatter's Tea Party
description: A peculiar tea party where time is perpetually stuck at 6 o'clock, and the Mad Hatter, March Hare, and Dormouse engage in nonsensical conversations.

name: The Queen of Hearts' Garden
description: A beautifully manicured garden belonging to the temperamental Queen of Hearts, known for its playing card soldiers and the constant threat of execution.

name: The Cheshire Cat's Forest
description: A mysterious forest inhabited by the enigmatic Cheshire Cat, who can appear and disappear at will and offers cryptic advice to Alice.

name: The Lost Boys' Hideout
description: A secret home for Peter Pan and his band of lost boys.

name: Pirate Ship
description: The menacing ship of Captain Hook and his crew.

name: Mermaid Lagoon
description: A beautiful lagoon inhabited by playful but mischievous mermaids.

name: Emerald City
description: The gleaming, green city ruled by the Wizard of Oz.

name: Munchkinland
description: The colorful and cheerful home of the Munchkins.

name: Yellow Brick Road
description: The famous road that leads to the Emerald City.

name: Cair Paravel
description: The majestic castle of the Kings and Queens of Narnia.

name: The Wardrobe
description: A portal between our world and Narnia.

name: The Lamppost
description: A guiding light in the heart of Narnia's forest.

name: Amusement Park
description: A place filled with thrilling rides, games, and delicious treats.

name: Zoo
description: An exciting place to see and learn about animals from around the world.

name: Aquarium
description: A magical underwater world featuring colorful fish, sharks, and marine life.

name: Children's Museum
description: An interactive space where kids can explore and discover through play.

name: Movie Theater
description: A place to watch the latest movies on the big screen with popcorn in hand.
